name: Navy Base
description:
1) Lead your fleet in a turn-based logical naval warfare
2) Choose your strategy: You can win by capturing enemy base or destroying enemy's fleet.
3) Play 36 unique levels: starting from very simple to really challenging.
4) Control 5 unique battleships: patrol ships, mines, minesweepers, cruisers, aircraft carriers.
5) Complete with friends in a global rating.

NavyBase is a combination of strategic, logical and board game. Your goal is to capture enemy base.

Follow us on the Facebook:
* https://www.facebook.com/navybaseapp

-----------------------------------------

Stay tuned! In VERSION 2 we are planning to release:
1) Multiplayer support - play with your friends and colleagues via bluetooth or Internet
2) New ship types: submarine, aircraft carrier, rocket ship, lighthouse
3) More levels, including logical and strategical ones
Boundless maps


FAIR SEAS AND FOLLOWING WIND!
